description:
Production-grade Model Context Protocol server for Google Calendar with comprehensive tools, resources, and prompts. Built on the Smithery TypeScript scaffold and the official MCP SDK.

Features include listing calendars and events, creating/updating/deleting events, free/busy queries, mutual free time discovery, ACL and sharing, colors and settings, quick-add, moving events, recurring instances, RSVP updates, dynamic resources, and scheduling prompts.

For a broader feature analysis and roadmap, see docs/comprehensive-google-calendar-mcp-features.md.

defaultCalendarId.description: Default calendar ID to use when omitted
